title: smoked cod with salad and anchovy dipping sauce
description: For something truly unique take inspiration from Scandinavia. All you need is a juniper branch and a little courage!
ingredients: 600g/1lb 5oz piece of cod, skin on, boned
½ head frisée lettuce, use only the light green and white parts, chopped
150ml/5fl oz oil from a jar of anchovies
